title: Top Floor Westwood 2BR 2BA PH+Central Air/Parking/Kitchen Appliances
posting_body: ['Top Floor 2 Bedroom 2 Bath Penthouse Apartment.', 'Prime Westwood!', 'Please do not visit property without our leasing agent.', 'Thank you!', 'Unrivaled quality, endless comforts, and gracious apartment living.', 'This top floor 2 bedroom 2 bath penthouse apartment features central air/heat, a cozy fireplace,and wood/carpet flooring.', 'Kitchen is equipped with appliances including a microwave, a dishwasher, a gas stove/oven and a refrigerator.', 'Our apartment homes are thoughtfully detailed with lavish amenities including covered parking, an elevator, a garage, fitness center, a laundry facility, and a pool on the roof of our community.', 'For appointment to see this apartment or for questions, call us at', 'show contact info', 'or apply at <URL>', '1400 Midvale Avenue', 'Westwood, Los Angeles, California, 90024', 'Brentwood, West LA, Beverly Hills', 'This 2 bedroom apartment offers the following features:', 'Cable Ready', 'Central Air/Heating', 'Gas Stove/Oven', 'Refrigerator', 'Carpet/Wood Floors', 'Cozy Gas Fireplace', 'Disability Access', 'Dishwasher', 'Tiles', 'Community Amenities:', 'Assigned Parking', 'Extra Storage', 'Beautiful Landscaping', 'Covered Parking', 'Elevator', 'Garage', 'Rooftop Spa', 'Swimming Pool', 'Disclaimer: Pictures are a representation but may not be of the exact apartment.', 'Advertised unit availability, rental rates, and terms are updated every 24 hours and conditions are subject to change without notice.', 'Please call for latest availability details.']
